ly.img.android.sdk.filter

Class ImageFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly.img.android.sdk.models.config.AbstractConfig
      • ly.img.android.sdk.filter.ImageFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, DataSourceInterface<AbstractConfig.BindData>, ImageFilterInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlFilterHatch, LutColorFilter, NoneImageFilter

    public abstract class ImageFilter
extends AbstractConfig
implements ImageFilterInterface
    Represents the Image-Filter base file. For Camera live Preview the filter is OpenGl Based but has also a Renderscript implementation to triggerOperatorsIfNeeded final images in full resolution.
